That's Clever – Carefully selected Useful and Creative Products from around the Globe that will inspire you.

Our shop has two very definitive sections:

That's Creative for unusual art, artisan accessories and carefully handcrafted designs. We offer a wide variety of products with unique twists that will give your home that special focal point of creativity.

That's Useful is what it says on the can. The latest gadgets within the gadget shop, home lighting, home aids and travel accessories that will prompt the saying "How did I manage before?"

Our Blog, Images and Factoids, provide that little bit of light relief and a talking point to de-stress from the modern world.

Free Returns

If you have any issues with any of the products that you have bought from ourselves, then please contact us via email or phone and we will be happy to help and get it resolved for you.
